mapper.select: select * from tbl_user order by uno desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(uno, user_id, password,name,email) values(seq_uno.nextval, #{user_id},#{password},#{name},#{email})
mapper.update: update tbl_user set suspension=#{suspension}, suspContent=#{suspContent},suspDate=#{suspDate} where user_id=#{user_id}
